pullrequest.title: Update control sync tutorial sample code and launch file to work with atlas v4/v5

content.raw:
I tried writing a one-liner to plot all of the signals, but it was pretty ugly. Here's a bash script that works. However, it tiles the subplots horizontally, not vertically, and I'm not sure how to fix the orientation via the command line.

```
rqt_plot&
sleep 1
topicnames=(command_age, command_age_mean, delay_in_step, delay_in_window, delay_window_remain)
for topic in ${topicnames[@]}
do
  rqt --command-start-plugin rqt_plot --args /atlas/controller_statistics/"${topic}" &
done
```

I put the script and edited plotting instructions in [branch drcsim_4.2_control_sync_rqtplot](#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/branch/drcsim_4.2_control_sync_rqtplot)
